name: Syllabs
overview:
Syllabs helps web sites to have more visitors and to enhance their user experience.

Syllabs is a Semantics as a Software company. We provide web services to:

  1. analyse texts

We can extract diferent kind of information from raw texts like the persons, the topics or complex relations between entities (like the company of a person). We kind do specific sentiment analysis (opinion mining on restaurants for instance).

  1. automatically generate texts from characteristics

Given a set of characteristics of an object, we can generate texts that describe this object. For instance, we can describe a camera, a person (biography) or a location.

The generated texts are human-like (good to enhance the user experience) and we guarantee their unicity (good for Search Engine Optimisation).

Our technology is base on 25 person-years of R&D. We have a multidisciplinary team pf 10 persons: computer scientists, linguists, researchers, engineers, bizdev. We invest a lot to be really multilingual. By now, we can handle 6 languages: Chinese, English, French, Italian, Polish, Spanish.
